name: Sakura(櫻)
description:
Information about this game
  • Developer: Astropower(itch.io)
  • Game Engine: Game Maker Studio 2
  • Develop time: 3 weeks
Description

You can control three different characters in this game: warrior, wizard, and shooter. It has five levels, each level has different mechanics. You need to kill the magic eye to win the game.

Control Guide
  • Move: WASD
  • Switch Character: ZXC
  • Mouse Button Left: attack
  • You can press space on the start menu to learn more.
